PWR.name: Power
PWR.description: Represents physical strength and melee damage.

FCS.name: Focus
FCS.description: Influences accuracy, spellcasting, and mental resistance.

CAP.name: Capacity
CAP.description: Determines health, carrying capacity, and endurance.

PER.name: Perception
PER.description: Impacts awareness, ranged accuracy, and critical chance.
